# sc config

**Description:** Configuration management

## Usage

```bash
sc config [action] [options]
```

## Options

| Option | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| `-v, --verbose` | Verbose output |
| `--section <name>` | Show specific section |
| `--json` | Output as JSON |
